sense.gloss: to value (highly), to think highly of, to have a high opinion of, to appreciate, to recognize
to incur (someone's anger, displeasure, etc.), to elicit (e.g. sneers), to invite (e.g. scorn), to evoke, to arouse, to win (someone's favour)
to accept, to take on, to take up
to pay for (a prostitute, geisha, etc.)
trade, buying and selling, trafficking (e.g. of humans, arms, drugs), dealing
school store, co-op, school canteen, tuck shop
buying used articles as a company, trade-in, buy back

sdata.j: ↑買↑↓か↓い↑物↑↓もの↓に↑行↑↓い↓かなければならない。↑一↑↓いち↓↑時間↑↓じかん↓で↑戻↑↓もど↓るよ。
sdata.e: I have to go shopping. I'll be back in an hour.

sdata.j: ↑飲↑↓の↓み↑物↑↓もの↓を↑俺↑↓おれ↓に↑頼↑↓たの↓まないでくれよ。↑自分↑↓じぶん↓で↑買↑↓か↓いにいけばいいだろ。
sdata.e: Stop asking me for a drink! Go get it yourself.

sdata.j: ↑靴↑↓くつ↓が↑小↑↓ちい↓さすぎるから↑新↑↓あたら↓しいのを↑買↑↓か↓う↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓があるな。
sdata.e: My shoes are too small. I need new ones.

sdata.j: あなたがじゃがいもを↑買↑↓か↓うように↑奇蹟↑↓きせき↓を↑買↑↓か↓うことができないなんて↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓に↑残念↑↓ざんねん↓だわ。
sdata.e: It's a pity that you can't buy miracles like you would buy potatoes.

sdata.j: いつか、↑綿菓子↑↓わたがし↓をつくる↑機械↑↓きかい↓を↑買↑↓か↓うんだ。
sdata.e: Someday I will buy a cotton candy machine.

sdata.j: ↑新↑↓あたら↓しいパソコンを↑買↑↓か↓わねばなりません。
sdata.e: I have to get a new computer.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑母↑↓はは↓はオレンジジュースを↑二↑↓に↓↑本↑↓ほん↓↑買↑↓か↓った。
sdata.e: My mother bought two bottles of orange juice.

sdata.j: ↑毎朝↑↓まいあさ↓↑買↑↓か↓い↑物↑↓もの↓をします。
ああ！　もし↑私↑↓わたし↓がお↑金持↑↓かねも↓ちだったら、スペインに↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑家↑↓いえ↓を↑買↑↓か↓ったのに。
sdata.e: Ah! If I were rich, I'd buy myself a house in Spain.

sdata.j: ああ！ もし↑私↑↓わたし↓がお↑金持↑↓かねも↓ちだったら、スペインに↑家↑↓いえ↓を↑買↑↓か↓うのに。
sdata.e: Ah! If I were rich, I'd buy myself a house in Spain.
